name: Five Nights at Cumass 2
description:
This is the sequel to Five Nights at Cumass. this new Five Nights at Cumass is much better in every way. It is so good in fact that it will fix all your problems. so you better play this game. otherwise you will have to face the consequences. 

btw mario is foxy so you need to flash ur light at mario but for all of the other guys you just have to put the mask on
